articles.title: Germany to Take Stake in Stricken Utility Uniper
articles.description: The country will take a 30% stake in Uniper, one of Europe’s largest utility companies, which has been hit hard by dwindling supplies of Russian gas and rising energy prices.
articles.content:
Germany will take a 30% stake in Uniper SE and provide a bailout deal after the ailing utility company was hit hard by dwindling supplies of Russian gas and rising energy prices.
